Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and functionality. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $150 to you. Please let me know if you're interested in making this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
